overview: Lori stages homes for a living and her busiest season is Christmas! Though she normally only stages homes that are for sale, sheâ€™s intrigued when a wealthy widower named Elliot asks her to stage his home for the holidays to cheer up his daughter, Maddie. As Lori spends more and more time with Elliot and Maddie, she starts to feel like part of the family.
title: Staging Christmas
